p: The total operation time was 240 min while the peritoneal separation time was 115 min. The patient was discharged 48 h after the operation. At the 3-month follow-up, the patient had a regular oral intake and defecation, no pain around the stoma, no seroma formation, and no infection at the incision site. The follow-up abdominal CT scan showed no recurrence of the hernia ( Figure 6).
